feedback:
Good application of DRIVER framework (demonstrated 4 stages). Consider strengthening the stages you didn't explicitly show.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission describes a working financial tool that fetches stock charts, runs technical analysis, and provides actionable buy/sell/hold guidance. The Discover and Implement stages provide clear, concrete evidence that the application performs financial tasks, satisfying the criterion.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Integrate AI: The submission clearly integrates an AI model into a working workflow and shows functional value (chart analysis and trading guidance), but treatment is high-level and lacks depth (no detailed explanation of prompts, model behavior, validation, or multiple examples). This meets a sound but basic integration, so PARTIAL.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "this is my AI uh technical analyst agent made in NAN."
"downloads the chart and then from there does a technical analysis using the open AI um chat model"
"thus makes much more easier to for me to choose whether I want to buy, sell or hold this particular um this particular stock."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER — student identifies the project as an AI technical analyst (purpose and user benefit). IMPLEMENT — student describes concrete workflow steps (getting chart URL, downloading chart, running technical analysis via the model, and sending results).
criteria.reasoning: The submission describes a working financial tool that fetches stock charts, runs technical analysis, and provides actionable buy/sell/hold guidance. The Discover and Implement stages provide clear, concrete evidence that the application performs financial tasks, satisfying the criterion.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "this is my AI uh technical analyst agent made in NAN."
"downloads the chart and then from there does a technical analysis using the open AI um chat model"
"thus makes much more easier to for me to choose whether I want to buy, sell or hold this particular um this particular stock."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — student frames the project as an "AI technical analyst agent," showing intent to use AI; Implement — describes workflow that downloads charts and calls an OpenAI chat model to perform technical analysis and return results.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly integrates an AI model into a working workflow and shows functional value (chart analysis and trading guidance), but treatment is high-level and lacks depth (no detailed explanation of prompts, model behavior, validation, or multiple examples). This meets a sound but basic integration, so PARTIAL.
